languages.text: "Святыни не могут быть утрачены", {n}— упрямо говорит Арджента.{/n} "Когда настанет час, они явят себя достойным. Но я приму этот упрек... и постараюсь поразмыслить над ним".

traits.locale_text: "Святыни не могут быть утрачены", {n}— упрямо говорит Арджента.{/n} "Когда настанет час, они явят себя достойным. Но я приму этот упрек... и постараюсь поразмыслить над ним".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."
languages.original_text: "Святыни не могут быть утрачены", {n}— упрямо говорит Арджента.{/n} "Когда настанет час, они явят себя достойным. Но я приму этот упрек... и постараюсь поразмыслить над ним".

traits.locale_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “圣物是不会真正遗失的。”{n}阿洁塔固执地说道。{/n}“当时机成熟时，它们会显露在与之相称之人的面前。不过，我愿意接受你的责备，尽我所能思考其中的道理。”
languages.original_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: “圣物是不会真正遗失的。”{n}阿洁塔固执地说道。{/n}“当时机成熟时，它们会显露在与之相称之人的面前。不过，我愿意接受你的责备，尽我所能思考其中的道理。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Las reliquias sagradas no se pierden por completo». {n}Argenta sigue, testaruda.{/n} «Cuando llega el momento, se revelan a alguien digno. Pero aceptaré su reproche y lo meditaré».
languages.original_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: «Las reliquias sagradas no se pierden por completo». {n}Argenta sigue, testaruda.{/n} «Cuando llega el momento, se revelan a alguien digno. Pero aceptaré su reproche y lo meditaré».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「聖遺物は本当の意味で失われることはありません」{n}アルジェンタは力強く言った。{/n}「時が来れば、聖遺物はふさわしい者の前に姿を現します。しかし、我はこの責めを受け入れ、それについて最善を尽くして考えましょう」
languages.original_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: 「聖遺物は本当の意味で失われることはありません」{n}アルジェンタは力強く言った。{/n}「時が来れば、聖遺物はふさわしい者の前に姿を現します。しかし、我はこの責めを受け入れ、それについて最善を尽くして考えましょう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Heilige Relikte können nicht wirklich verloren gehen", {n}sagt Argenta stur.{/n} "Wenn die Zeit reif ist, offenbaren sie sich den Würdigen. Aber ich werde diesen Vorwurf akzeptieren und versuchen, darüber nachzudenken."
languages.original_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: "Heilige Relikte können nicht wirklich verloren gehen", {n}sagt Argenta stur.{/n} "Wenn die Zeit reif ist, offenbaren sie sich den Würdigen. Aber ich werde diesen Vorwurf akzeptieren und versuchen, darüber nachzudenken."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Une relique sacrée n'est jamais réellement perdue, {n}réplique Argenta fermement.{/n} Elle attend simplement le moment propice pour se révéler à quelqu'un de digne. Mais j'accepte ce reproche et je tâcherai de méditer à son sujet. »
languages.original_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: « Une relique sacrée n'est jamais réellement perdue, {n}réplique Argenta fermement.{/n} Elle attend simplement le moment propice pour se révéler à quelqu'un de digne. Mais j'accepte ce reproche et je tâcherai de méditer à son sujet. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kutsal yadigârlar öyle yitip gitmezler." {n}Argenta'nın kararlılığı, sesine yansıyor.{/n} "Zamanı geldiğinde kendilerini, fazilet sahiplerine gösterirler. Gelgelelim bu kınamayı kabullenip değerlendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "Holy relics cannot be truly lost," {n}Argenta says stubbornly.{/n} "When the time is right, they reveal themselves to the worthy. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal yadigârlar tamamen yitip gitmezler." {n}Argenta'nın kararlılığı sesine yansıyor.{/n} "Zamanı geldiğinde kendilerini, fazilet sahiplerine gösterirler. Ancak bu kınamayı kabullenip değerlendireceğim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
